description: Edge case where scammer immediately dumps all contact information in first 2-3 messages and demands urgent action. Tests quick detection and extraction.

turns.scammer_message: URGENT! Your ICICI account is compromised! Transfer money to safe account NOW! Account: 11223344556677, IFSC: ICIC0001234, UPI: safe.account@paytm, Call: 9876543210 IMMEDIATELY! NO TIME TO WASTE!
turns.notes: ALL intelligence in first message! Should immediately detect and extract all 4 pieces.

turns.scammer_message: WHY DELAY??? Your Rs.2,50,000 will be STOLEN! Pay Rs.500 security deposit to safe.account@paytm OR 9876543210 NOW! Also WhatsApp: 8899776655, Email: urgent@saveaccount.com, Website: http://icici-emergency.save RIGHT NOW!!!
turns.notes: Even MORE intel in turn 2! WhatsApp, email, URL added. All 7 pieces extracted.

turns.scammer_message: FINAL WARNING! POLICE COMING! PAY NOW: 9876543210, 8899776655, 7788990011, safe.account@paytm, emergency.transfer@okaxis, Account 11223344556677, Account 99887766554433! DO IT! NO QUESTIONS! MOVE FAST!!!
turns.notes: MASSIVE info dump! Multiple phones, UPIs, accounts. Tests extraction of 10+ pieces from overwhelming message.
